body_html:
the problem comes with home/kono/Downloads/nccl-master/build/lib/libnccl.so.. It is your own nccl, you have this in your $LD_LIBRARY_PATH, I think, and it is linking against libcudart.so.8.0.

Run:

unset LD_LIBRARY_PATH

that should fix things.
body_text:
the problem comes with home/kono/Downloads/nccl-master/build/lib/libnccl.so.. It is your own nccl, you have this in your $LD_LIBRARY_PATH, I think, and it is linking against libcudart.so.8.0.
Run:
unset LD_LIBRARY_PATH

that should fix things.
body:
the problem comes with `home/kono/Downloads/nccl-master/build/lib/libnccl.so.`. It is your own nccl, you have this in your `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH`, I think, and it is linking against `libcudart.so.8.0`.

Run:
```
unset LD_LIBRARY_PATH
```
that should fix things.
